instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3209: What is 820-3209? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keeps rebooting at login screen
threads.message: Mac startsup and goes to login screen, then reboots and keeps continuing this. Green and orange light present. Fan starts spinning high immediately, not sure if these 3209 also need to spin 3 x before booting like 3437 but this one does not. No signs of liquid damage all clean. What should I be checking?

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keeps rebooting at login screen
threads.message: Does it do the same off a known good external drive?

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keeps rebooting at login screen
threads.message: Try remove wifi card and ssd, these toshiba ssd known for getting very hot and failed. This board doent spin 3x

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keeps rebooting at login screen
threads.message: tried it without SSD and Wifi still the same, fan is spinning very high at power on and after I enter the external boot drive it just shuts down.

threads.title: Macbook Air <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3209</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> keeps rebooting at login screen
